THIS THEME WAS ORIGINALLY CREATED BY THOMAS CULP

The anarchist Library - Dark Mode
data.description: A dark mode version of the anarchist library. Some times a white background with black text can hurt the eyes. This should help by making the background a dark gray and only having the content thats imporant in a white box.
